attributes.action: ensure that Lord Stevens pays back every penny of taxpayers money he received during the time he concocted his report into the death of Princess Diana, the report now having been rejected IN ITS ENTIRETY by the coroner, and, further, that this demonstrates that Lord Stevens is not worthy of retention of his position as a member of the House of Lords and should be removed from there forthwith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
